storyList.PART_1: Hello! I'm [name]! I just quit my job
storyList.PART_2: Have you spoken to [otherfriend]? They are really cool! We've been bonding over our shared experiences
storyList.PART_3: This was amazing! I'll never forget the friends I made here. I'm off to travel the world!
storyList.PART_4: Hoi! Bonjour! Olá! I learned so much in my travels
